description: Try our easy to follow Banana Prawn Tom Yum recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Banana Prawn Tom Yum Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare noodles as per packet instructions. Drain and place into 4 bowls. Add prawns, vegetables and broth. Top with remaining spring onion, coriander and mint leaves, to serve.
